name: Ultraman VS Akatsuki Fanmade Game JUST FOR FUN :D
name_original: Ultraman VS Akatsuki Fanmade Game JUST FOR FUN :D
description:
Keys:

PC

WASD - MOVE

LEFT MOUSE CLICK - ATTACK

F - SPECIAL ATTACK

SPACE - JUMP

* WARNING!!

DO NOT RE-SELLING THIS GAME, THIS GAME IS FREE AND JUST FOR FUN (I MADE THIS GAME FOR LEARNING PURPOSE). 

Disclaimer This game is made for learning purposes only.

Any and all assets are copyrighted to their rightful owners.
